name: FAWE
description:
A mysterious fog suddenly appeared one day, wiping out all the lifeforms from the Earth by taking away its elemental powers. Without those blessings, there is no oxygen, no water, no living organisms, and no fire. The only “living” thing is a man-made android named Jammo. 

       In this 3D-platformer game, the player acts as the android seeking to help the Earth regain its powers by collecting the elemental particles necessary for the lifeforms to come back. “FAWE” is structured in five levels with four levels each representing an element such as water, air, fire, or earth. The fifth level combines the previous four together. To revive the Earth, the player must travel through the levels, avoid obstacles, and receive multiple blessings from the totems that correspond with the elements. Will you be our hero?

Credits:

Level and User Interface Design: Jiaxin Huang 

Game Mechanics: Michael Baker

Music and Sound: Youtube Audio Library: Nat Keefe & BeatMower, Silent Partner, Dan Bodan, Craig MacArthur

3D PlatformTexture and Material: GrayLabInitiative

Elemental Totems Art Asset: Gnome's Artworks

Character Model: Mix and Jam

Waypoint Particles: Goldman Studio

Earth Model: headwards
